article_title: Five strategies driving today's prime contractors -- Washington Technology
article_text: In an exclusive for WT Insider members, we are collecting all of the contract awards we cover into a database that you can sort by contractor, agency, value and other parameters. You can also download it into a spreadsheet. Our databases track awards back to 2013. Read More

article_metadata.keywords: government contracting, Nick Wakeman, market strategies, Washington Technology

og.description: Companies are adopting a variety of strategies to succeed in today's market. Here the five most common approaches, and who's adopting them.

article_summary:
Our databases track awards back to 2013.
In an exclusive for WT Insider members, we are collecting all of the contract awards we cover into a database that you can sort by contractor, agency, value and other parameters.
You can also download it into a spreadsheet.
